name: Alien Road
description:
Alien Road is a horror game similar to Slender. Instead of finding pages, you find the aliens and try to capture them. You do this while avoiding monsters that lurk in the shadows. Its very simple and fun for a scary game.

Only the demo is available for download. Its free and playable. The full, paid version of the game will be announced and/or released 2 - 3 weeks from now. Enjoy the demo!

CONTROLS:
WASD / ARROWS - MOVE
W - FORWARD
S - BACKWARD
A- LEFT
D - RIGHT
TAB - SHOW / HIDE OBJECTIVE
F1 - SHOW / HIDE FPS COUNTER

HOW TO PLAY:
MOVE UP TO THE ALIEN TO COLLECT THEM.
YOU HAVE A COUNTER ON THE TOP RIGHT OF THE SCREEN.
IF THAT REACHES ZERO / 0, YOU WILL HAVE TO RUNNN!

TIPS:
FOLLOW THE DOTS THAT COME TOWARDS YOU.

Specs:

Requires DirectX 9

Memory: 2 GB Ram

Platform: Windows 10
